TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClaimsIdentity extends System.Object implements class System.Security.Principal.IIdentity
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ClaimsIdentity extends System.Object implements class System.Security.Principal.IIdentity

summary.span: 表示基于声明的标识。

span.span: Represents a claims-based identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是基于声明的标识的具体实现; 即，声明集合描述的标识。The class is a concrete implementation of a claims-based identity; that is, an identity described by a collection of claims. 声明是有关由颁发者创建的实体的声明，该实体描述了该实体的属性、权限或其他质量。A claim is a statement about an entity made by an issuer that describes a property, right, or some other quality of that entity. 此类实体称为声明的使用者。Such an entity is said to be the subject of the claim. 声明由 类表示。A claim is represented by the class. 中包含的声明 描述对应标识表示的实体，并可用于做出授权和身份验证决定。The claims contained in a describe the entity that the corresponding identity represents, and can be used to make authorization and authentication decisions. 基于声明的访问模型具有比专用于角色的更传统访问模型更多的优势。A claims-based access model has many advantages over more traditional access models that rely exclusively on roles. 例如，声明可以提供有关其所表示的标识的更丰富的信息，并且可以通过更具体的方式评估授权或身份验证。For example, claims can provide much richer information about the identity they represent and can be evaluated for authorization or authentication in a far more specific manner. 从 .NET Framework 4.5 开始，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 和基于声明的标识已完全集成到 .NET Framework 中。Beginning with .NET Framework 4.5, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) and claims-based identity have been fully integrated into the .NET Framework. 这意味着，在 .NET Framework 中表示标识的许多类现在派生自 ，并通过声明的集合描述其属性。This means that many classes that represent an identity in the .NET Framework now derive from and describe their properties through a collection of claims. 这不同于以前版本的 .NET Framework，在这种情况下，这些类 直接实现接口。This is different from previous versions of the .NET Framework, in which, these classes implemented the interface directly. 描述标识的声明集合可通过属性进行访问 。The collection of claims that describe the identity can be accessed through the property. 类提供多种方法用于查找和修改声明，并完全支持 (LINQ) 的语言集成查询。The class provides several methods for finding and modifying claims and fully supports language integrated queries (LINQ). 在应用程序代码中， 通常通过 对象（例如返回的主体）访问对象 。In application code, objects are typically accessed through objects; for example, the principal returned by . > [!NOTE] > 类 还具有属性。The class has a property as well. 在大多数情况下，你应该通过 集合而不是通过集合来访问用户的声明 。In the majority of cases you should access the user's claims through the collection rather than through the collection. 仅当主体包含多个 ，并且需要评估或修改特定标识时，才需要访问单个的声明。You will need to access the claims of an individual only in the cases where the principal contains more than one and you need to evaluate or modify a specific identity. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要在集合中添加或删除声明 ，调用方必须具有完全信任。To add or remove claims from the collection, a caller must have full trust. 在基于声明的模型中， 通过计算标识中包含的声明来实现属性和方法。In the claims-based model, the property and the method are implemented by evaluating the claims contained by an identity. 基于声明的模型中的基本实现由 属性和 方法提供。The base implementations in the claims-based model are provided by the property and the method. 使用 和 属性可以指定在执行这些操作时应该用于评估标识所包含的声明的声明类型。The and properties enable you to specify a claim type that should be used to evaluate the claims contained by the identity when performing these operations. 委托方案通过 和属性进行支持 。Delegation scenarios are supported through the and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||如果 `identity` 可从中赋值，则为 属性的值 `identity.Actor` ; 否则为 `null` 。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.Actor` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||`identity.AuthenticationType` 使用 () 属性的值。The value of the `identity.AuthenticationType` () property is used.| ||如果 `identity` 可从中赋值，则为 属性的值 `identity.BootStrapContext` ; 否则为 `null` 。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.BootStrapContext` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||如果 `identity` 是从中分配 的，则中的声明 `identity` 将添加到新实例; 否则为空集合。If `identity` is assignable from , the claims from `identity` are added to the new instance; otherwise, an empty collection.| ||**注意：** 在访问时，将 基于属性的值返回属性的值 。**Note:** When accessed, the value of the property is returned based on the value of the property.| ||如果 `identity` 可从中赋值，则为 属性的值 `identity.Label` ; 否则为 `null` 。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.Label` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||如果不 `identity` 是从中赋值 ，则不是 `null` ，并且具有 不为的属性 `null` ; 名称声明将使用属性的值添加到新实例中 。If `identity` is not assignable from , is not `null`, and has an property that is not `null`; a name claim is added to the new instance using the value of the property. **注意：** 在访问时，将 基于和集合返回属性的值 。**Note:** When accessed, the value of the property is returned based on the and the collection.| ||如果可 `identity` 从中赋值 ，则使用属性的值 `identity.NameClaimType` ; 否则 使用。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.NameClaimType` property is used; otherwise, is used.| ||如果可 `identity` 从中赋值 ，则使用属性的值 `identity.RoleClaimType` ; 否则 使用。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.RoleClaimType` property is used; otherwise, is used.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||如果 `identity` 可从中赋值，则为 属性的值 `identity.Actor` ; 否则为 `null` 。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.Actor` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||`authenticationType` 参数。The `authenticationType` parameter. 如果 `authenticationType` 参数为 `null` 或空字符串，则 `identity.AuthenticationType` 使用 () 属性的值 。If the `authenticationType` parameter is `null` or an empty string, the value of the `identity.AuthenticationType` () property is used.| ||如果 `identity` 可从中赋值，则为 属性的值 `identity.BootStrapContext` ; 否则为 `null` 。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.BootStrapContext` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||从参数初始化 `claims` 。Initialized from the `claims` parameter. 如果 `identity` 可从分配 ，则中的声明 `identity` 将添加到新的实例中，然后再由参数指定的实例 `claims` 。If `identity` is assignable from , the claims from `identity` are added to the new instance before those specified by the `claims` parameter.| ||**注意：** 在访问时，将 基于属性的值返回属性的值 。**Note:** When accessed, the value of the property is returned based on the value of the property.| ||如果 `identity` 可从中赋值，则为 属性的值 `identity.Label` ; 否则为 `null` 。If `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.Label` property; otherwise, `null`.| ||如果不 `identity` 是从中赋值 ，则不是 `null` ，并且具有 不为的属性 `null` ; 名称声明将使用属性的值添加到新实例中 。If `identity` is not assignable from , is not `null`, and has an property that is not `null`; a name claim is added to the new instance using the value of the property. **注意：** 在访问时，将 基于和集合返回属性的值 。**Note:** When accessed, the value of the property is returned based on the and the collection.| ||`nameType` 参数的值。The value of the `nameType` parameter. 但是，如果参数的值 `nameType` 为 `null` 或空字符串，并且可 `identity` 从中赋值 ，则使用属性的值 `identity.NameClaimType` ; 否则 使用。However, if the value of the `nameType` parameter is `null` or an empty string and `identity` is assignable from , the value of the `identity.NameClaimType` property is used; otherwise, is used.| ||`roleClaimType` 参数的值。The value of the `roleClaimType` parameter. 但是，如果参数的值 `roleClaimType` 为 `null` 或空字符串，并且标识可从赋值，则 `identity.RoleClaimType` 使用属性的值; 否则 使用。However, if the value of the `roleClaimType` parameter is `null` or an empty string and identity is assignable from , the value of the `identity.RoleClaimType` property is used; otherwise, is used.|

summary.span: 获取或设置被授予委派权利的调用方的标识。

span.span: Gets or sets the identity of the calling party that was granted delegation rights.

value.span: 授予委托权利的调用方。

span.span: The calling party that was granted delegation rights.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以通过递归检查属性来访问导致当前调用的委托链 。An application can access the delegation chain that led to the current call, by recursively examining the property. 委托给其调用的标记可以通过属性进行访问 。The token on whose behalf the call is being delegated can be accessed through the property.

span.span: The claim to add.

summary.span: 添加单个声明到此声明标识。

span.span: Adds a single claim to this claims identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检查声明，如果使用者与此声明标识不同，则 使用此声明标识作为参数来调用方法，以使用正确的主题创建新声明。The claim is examined and if the subject is different than this claims identity, the method is invoked with this claims identity as the parameter to create a new claim with the correct subject. 此方法已 `SecurityCritical` 应用特性来控制哪些实体可以将声明添加到标识。This method has the `SecurityCritical` attribute applied to control which entities can add claims to the identity. 在管道中，根据集合中存在的声明做出授权决定 。Further down the pipe, authorization decisions are made based on the claims that are present in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检查每个声明，如果使用者与此声明标识不同，则 使用此声明标识作为参数来调用方法，以使用正确的主题创建新声明。Each claim is examined and if the subject is different than this claims identity, the method is invoked with this claims identity as the parameter to create a new claim with the correct subject. 此方法已 `SecurityCritical` 应用特性来控制哪些实体可以将声明添加到标识。This method has the `SecurityCritical` attribute applied to control which entities can add claims to the identity. 在管道中，根据集合中存在的声明做出授权决定 。Further down the pipe, authorization decisions are made based on the claims that are present in the collection.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于创建此声明标识的令牌。

span.span: Gets or sets the token that was used to create this claims identity.
The bootstrap context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基础对象是类的实例 。The underlying object is an instance of the class. 在 `saveBootstrapContext` 配置文件中的[ < identityConfiguration > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration)或[ < securityTokenHandlerConfiguration > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration)元素上设置属性，以指定用于生成的令牌是否 应保留在 属性中。Set the `saveBootstrapContext` attribute on either the [<identityConfiguration>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration) or the [<securityTokenHandlerConfiguration>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration) element in a configuration file to specify whether the token used to generate the should be preserved in the property. 如果该 属性不为 `null` ，则应用程序可以访问通过类的属性和方法生成的原始令牌和声明 。If the property is not `null`, applications can access the original token and the claims it produced through the properties and methods of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Claims As IEnumerable(Of Claim)

summary.span: 获取与此声明标识关联的声明。

span.span: Gets the claims associated with this claims identity.

value.span: 与此声明标识相关联的声明的集合。

span.span: The collection of claims associated with this claims identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合可以包含的项 `null` 。The collection may contain entries that are `null`. 集合中包含的声明 实质上描述由表示的实体 。The claims contained in the collection essentially describe the entity that is represented by the . 声明描述了实体所拥有的属性和权限，应用程序可以对其进行检查以做出身份验证和授权的决策。The claims describe the properties and rights possessed by the entity and can be examined by applications to make decisions about authentication and authorization. > [!NOTE] > 类 还具有属性。The class has a property as well. 在大多数情况下，你应该通过 集合而不是通过集合来访问用户的声明 。In the majority of cases you should access the user's claims through the collection rather than through the collection. 仅当主体包含多个 ，并且需要评估或修改特定标识时，才需要访问单个的声明。You will need to access the claims of an individual only in the cases where the principal contains more than one and you need to evaluate or modify a specific identity.

span.span: The claim to remove.

summary.span: 尝试从声明标识中移除一个声明。

span.span: Attempts to remove a claim from the claims identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能删除该声明，因为它不是由标识所有。It is possible that the claim cannot be removed because it is not owned by the identity. 例如，这是主体拥有的角色声明的事例。For example, this would be the case for role claims that are owned by the principal. 与 方法不同，该方法返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否已删除声明， 如果声明无法移除，则会引发异常。Unlike the method, which returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the claim has been removed, throws an exception if the claim could not be removed 指定的声明按对象引用 () 来匹配 。The specified claim is matched by object reference (). 此方法已 `SecurityCritical` 应用特性来控制哪些实体可以从标识中删除声明。This method has the `SecurityCritical` attribute applied to control which entities can remove claims from the identity. 在管道中，根据集合中存在的声明做出授权决定 。Further down the pipe, authorization decisions are made based on the claims that are present in the collection.

span.span: The claim cannot be removed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RoleClaimType As String
public: property System::String ^ RoleClaimType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取将解释为此声明标识中声明的 .NET Framework 角色的声明类型。

span.span: Gets the claim type that will be interpreted as a .NET Framework role among the claims in this claims identity.
The role claim type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 角色声明类型是在为 方法评估此标识时使用的声明类型 () 。The role claim type is the claim type () that is used when evaluating this identity for the method. 调用方法来确定当前主体是否属于指定的角色。The method is called to determine whether the current principal is in a specified role. 基于声明的模型扩展了此检查以使用主体提供的声明。The claims-based model extends this check to use claims presented by the principal. 一个 对象可以包含一个或多个 对象，并且每个标识对象可以包含多个 对象。A object can contain one or more objects and each identity object can contain multiple objects. 属性指定在评估此对象时，应用于为角色提供值的声明的声明类型 。The property specifies the claim type of the claim that should be used to provide the value for the role when evaluating this object. 属性由构造函数设置。The property is set by the constructor. 公用值为 。A common value is .
